Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive tier II membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Cory M. Rose
Summary: Grants retroactive tier II membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Cory M. Rose for part-time employment during 2004--2005.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to granting retroactive tier II membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to Cory M. Rose
